import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import './Home.css'; import { URI } from "../config-react.js"; import bootstrap from "bootstrap"; const Home = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [room, setRoom] = useState(""); const [validated, setValidated] = useState(false); var get_name = window.location.href.match(/([^\/]*)\/*$/)[1]; if(get_name === URI) { // TODO: RegEx und diese Zeile evtl nochmal überarbeiten get_name = ""; } function setStates(p_room) { setRoom(p_room); if(name === "") { setName(get_name); } } const handleSubmit = (event) => { const form = event.currentTarget; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } setValidated(true); }; return (
